channel.title: function on Vc

item.title: Constexpr
item.description: 0.Array int url[10]; //true int url[6 + 4] //true int len = 10; int url[len] //flase 1.Constexpr #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { /* * If have not constexpr, CPP throw error */ constexpr int num = 1 + 2 + 3; int url[num] = {1,2,3,4,5,6}; couts<< url[1] << endl; return 0; } 2.Only have one ‘return’ # Error constexpr int display(int x) { int ret = 1 + 2 + x; return ret; } # True constexpr int display(int x) { return 1 + 2 + x; } 3.
